content: Kazuto FukuchiKazuto Fukuchi, Ph.D. fukuchi [at] cs.tsukuba.ac.jp University of Tsukuba Ibaraki, Japan nanofi 0000-0003-3895-219X DBLP Google Scholar arXiv Speaker DeckResearch MapI am an assistant professor at the University of Tsukuba and a visiting researcher at the RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project (RIKEN AIP). My research interests lie in mathematical statistics and machine learning, with a particular focus on data bias issues such as fairness, transfer learning, out-of-distribution generalization, and robustness. You can find my publications here.Research and Opportunities: For more information about our research projects and available positions (including master’s and doctoral opportunities), please visit our laboratory’s web page.Career: Assistant Professor, University of Tsukuba (2019–present) • Visiting Researcher, RIKEN AIP (2019–present) • Postdoctoral Researcher, RIKEN AIP (2018–2019)Education: Ph.D. in Engineering, Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering, University of Tsukuba (2018) • M.S. in Engineering, Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering, University of Tsukuba (2015) • B.S. in Computer Science, School of Informatics, University of Tsukuba (2013)Recent NewsOur new paper has been accepted at ICML2025!
